name: Aim Master
description:
Aim Master is the FPS/TPS aim training game, developed to improve your aiming skills in the famous battle royal FPS/TPS game.

Features:
- Mouse sensitivity same with the famous battle royal FPS/TPS game.
- 4 Assult Rifles and 1 Sniper rifle provided.
- Holographic sight, Red dot sight, 2x scope, 3x scope, 4x scope, 6x scope
- Very similar gun recoil pattern with PUBG
